reviewText: My son just recently discovered Blue from his older sister's toys and DVDs. He loves this DVD so much, he walks around carrying it and looking at the picture when he's not watching it. I bought this DVD as a replacement for the first copy which got totally scratched up. Blue's Clues is getting harder and harder to find, so I was happy to find it here and for a great price!
it's ok the first time around but not a dvd that kids like to watch over and over

My son, who just turned two, absolutely loves this DVD.  There are five episodes on one DVD, two Blue's Room, one with Joe and two with Steve.  It's a great mix of stories.  My son giggles through the whole thing!  And it's not mind-numbing like some other kids shows.

she insisted on going back to her favorite Dora dvd's,

two weeks later after seeing it maybe once , it became her favorite

and she can watch it over and over again.

this dvd has a vareity and is educatrional and interesting.

This is one of the first Blue's Clues DVDs with the "new" program formatting... where Blue becomes a puppet in the "Blue's Room" segments of the show (instead of being ALL a cartoon figure). This particular DVD has three Blue's Clue's episodes and one "Blue's Room" only episode, which all feature "food" items. The food items mostly surround a Birthday theme, so this is a great DVD to watch with your child around their Birthday time. :) Although I personally like the three full-length episodes's format over the "Blue's Room only" episode, I found this DVD very enjoyable and I highly recommend it.

To correct Logan and avoid any confusion, this DVD is not a collection of the Blue's Room shorts-- rather, it contains as its spotlight the first Blue's Room half-hour special, and some episodes from Blue's Clues.

I have seen the Blue's Room short comercials shown on TV  which Nick Jr calls Snack jacks. They were really great. Ofcourse,it's not available on VHS.This doesn't have special features. See ya there(that's what blue always says after the Snack Jacks)!(...)
Love it, my favorite bedtime reading material. (daughter lol)
This was a gift for my roommate's daughter and she loved it!
My son collects Blues Clues DVDs and they are often hard to find in retail stores anymore.  A good quality DVD.
My 14 month old son is loving Blue's Clues. I like the Blue's Room because she talks, but it's nice they have the old episodes too.
My one year old daughter loves it and my son loved it when he was two! Plus, mom and dad think it's amusing too. :)
MY 2Y/O HAS LEARNED SO MUCH JUST WATCHING THE DIFFERENT BLUE'S ROOMS DVDS. MAKES IT A LITTLE EASIER TO CONTINUE TO HELP HIM LEARN.
